Text:
WMP refuses to play this. Says "one or more codecs required.

DVDSanta says "Unable to open the video file...."

Please inform wich codec is needed to deal with this. WMP is up-to-date, and has played many Xvid files

try vlc player
http://www.videolan.org/vlc/ 
it has everything needed built in.
or if you want to be more complicated; the two audio tracks are matroska encoded. most codec packs include everything needed. or go direct http://packs.matroska.org/latest/Matroska_Pack_Lite.exe
Thank you . VLC works. I'll try the Matroska codec with the Conversion utility I use to make DVD.
please seed this when you finished downloading. i'm the only seeder and can't seed it forever
I would have prefered if you haven't messed with the audio.. >.>
